FROM tree LEFT JOIN species_tree ON tree.species_id = species_tree.id WHERE ST_Within( geographical_point, ST_MakeEnvelope(#{bottomRight.x}, #{bottomRight.y}, #{topLeft.x}, #{topLeft.y}) )
